name: The Blind Shop
description: The Blind Shop is a leading online blind shop in the UK. For over 13 years, we've been manufacturing made to measure blinds in our own factory. We only use the highest quality components to make durable blinds that will stand up to day-to-day operation in the home and in commercial applications.
